bill.title: Lower Hamakua Ditch; Irrigation; Temporary Toll Cap
bill.description: Limits the toll that the Board of Agriculture may charge for water from Lower Hamakua Ditch. Takes effect on 7/1/2015. Repeals on 6/30/2025. (HB2179 CD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to AGR, FIN, referral sheet 5
Bill scheduled to be heard by AGR on Monday, 02-10-14 10:01AM in House conference room 312.

The committees on AGR recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Wooley, Onishi, Awana, Brower, Choy, Ohno, Tokioka, Tsuji, Matsumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cachola.
Reported from AGR (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 442-14) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Cachola, Carroll, Takumi excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-20-14 11:00AM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Johanson, Cullen, Hashem, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka, Yamashita, Fukumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Woodson.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 573-14), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Har, Say excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 90).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to AGL, WAM.
The committee(s) on AGL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-11-14 2:45PM in conference room 229.
The committee on AGL deferred the measure.
The committee(s) on AGL will hold a public decision making on 03-20-14 2:45PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on AGL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in AGL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, Kouchi, Dela Cruz, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) English, Wakai, Slom.
Reported from AGL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3069) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-28-14 9:20AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Kouchi, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Tokuda, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3365) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-14.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Galuteria, Hee). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 612) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 676).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Nishihara Chair; Kouchi Co-Chair; Slom Member.
House Conferees Appointed: Wooley, Onishi Co-Chairs; Nakashima, Matsumoto Members.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 684).
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 673).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Tuesday, 04-22-14 1:00PM in conference room 224.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Wednesday 04-23-14 9:40AM in conference room 224.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-24-14 9:30AM in conference room 224.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday, 04-24-14 at 2:30PM in Conference Room 224.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-25-14 9:45AM in conference room 224.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-25-14 2:45PM in conference room 224.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Wooley, Onishi, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Nakashima.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, Kouchi; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 122-14) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday 04-29-14.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 122-14).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-29-14.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with Representative(s) Jordan voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ito excused (1).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 720).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 751).
Transmitted to Governor.
